description: Make this classic Aussie treat at home with our easy lamington recipe. These fluffy chocolate, coconut and cherry delights are bound to fly off the table.
name: Lamingtons With Cherry Jam & Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve lamingtons horizontally. Spread half of the lamingtons with jam and top with cream. Sandwich with remaining lamington. Serve.
